original_text: Pilate then said to the leaders of the priests and to all the crowd of people, ‘I cannot find any reason to say that this man is guilty.’
korean_text: 빌라도가 대제사장들과 무리에게 이르되 내가 보니 이 사람에게 죄가 없도다 하니

sentences.original_text: to the leaders of the priests
and to all the crowd of people

sentences.korean_translation: 나는 어떤 이유도 찾을 수 없다

sentences.original_text: to say that this man is guilty
